Event: I`m not impressed that it almost always rains on Bank Holidays !! Stil... It`s a free day - no college
Post: "It's no surprise that it always rains on Bank Holidays because the weather is just inherently against us having a nice day off. I mean, why would it bother to be sunny and pleasant when we're trying to relax and enjoy ourselves? No, instead, it insists on pouring down rain, ruining our plans and making us all miserable. It's like the weather is trying to tell us that we don't deserve a break from the usual grind. But you know what? I'm not going to let it get me down. I'll just grab an umbrella, put on my rain boots, and go about my day with a smile on my face. Because at the end of the day, it's not the weather that controls our happiness, it's our own attitudes and mindsets. #SAS #StableAttributionalStyle #RainyBankHolidays"
